facts.1: National Happy Hour Day is celebrated on November 12th to enjoy discounted drinks and appetizers at bars and restaurants.
facts.2: Happy hour typically takes place in the late afternoon or early evening and is a popular time for socializing with friends and colleagues.
facts.3: The day encourages people to take a break, relax, and enjoy good company and refreshments.

facts.1: National French Dip Day celebrates the French dip sandwich, a delicious combination of roast beef on a baguette served with a side of au jus for dipping.
facts.2: The French dip sandwich is believed to have originated in Los Angeles in the early 20th century.
facts.3: The day encourages people to enjoy a French dip sandwich at their favorite restaurant or try making one at home.

facts.1: World Pneumonia Day is observed on November 12th to raise awareness about pneumonia, a leading cause of death among children under five.
facts.2: The day promotes efforts to prevent, diagnose, and treat pneumonia through vaccination, proper nutrition, and access to healthcare.
facts.3: World Pneumonia Day was established in 2009 by the Global Coalition Against Child Pneumonia to mobilize action against the disease.
